column1: Table 3. Property victimization, by type of property crime, 2014 and 2015
Data source: National Crime Victimization Survey, 2014 and 2015
Author:  Jennifer L. Truman, Ph.D., and Rachel E. Morgan, Ph.D., BJS Statisticians
Property victimization, by type of property crime, 2014 and 2015
Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. Total number of households was 129,492,740 in 2014 and 131,962,260 in 2015. See appendix table 6 for standard errors.
†Significant difference from comparison year at 95% confidence level.
‡Significant difference from comparison year at 90% confidence level.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2014 and 2015.
